block_comment: This block determines and holds the polarity of a running process based on the end status. It utilizes a ternary operator that checks the status of "run_end". If "run_end" is true, it assigns the value of "run_polarity" to "run_polarity_held_ns". Otherwise, it holds the current state by assigning the value of "run_polarity_held_r" to "run_polarity_held_ns".
